languages.text: "Я дал старт операции "Драгоценный страж" — оставил на Эпитафии гарнизон, отобрал у Теодоры ключ от пространственных врат, запечатал их и начал изготовление Ярма. Теодору я держал под прицелом, как и ее наследников — на всякий случай. Незадолго до ее смерти я решил приставить к ней Хейнрикса и поручил Теодоре подобрать его на Райкад Минорисе. Но унаследовала Хейнрикса уже Ваша Светлость. Признаюсь, о вас я не был осведомлен — вы оказались тайным козырем Теодоры, ее секретным преемником".

"I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to rendezvous with him on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."
languages.original_text: "Я дал старт операции "Драгоценный страж" — оставил на Эпитафии гарнизон, отобрал у Теодоры ключ от пространственных врат, запечатал их и начал изготовление Ярма. Теодору я держал под прицелом, как и ее наследников — на всякий случай. Незадолго до ее смерти я решил приставить к ней Хейнрикса и поручил Теодоре подобрать его на Райкад Минорисе. Но унаследовала Хейнрикса уже Ваша Светлость. Признаюсь, о вас я не был осведомлен — вы оказались тайным козырем Теодоры, ее секретным преемником".

traits.locale_text: "I gave the start to the 'Precious Guardian' operation — left a garrison on the Epitaph, closed the dimensional gates and started the creation of the Yoke. I had kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights — just in case. Not long before her death, I decided to appoint Heinrix to her and ordered her to pick him up on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I was not aware of you — you ended up being the ace in Theodora's sleeve, her secret heir{mf||ess}."

"I gave the start to the 'Precious Guardian' operation — left a garrison on the Epitaph, closed the dimensional gates and started the creation of the Yoke. I had kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights — just in case. Not long before her death, I decided to appoint Heinrix to her and ordered her to pick him up on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I was not aware of you — you ended up being the ace in Theodora's sleeve, her secret heir{mf||ess}."

"I greenlit the Precious Guardian operation as I left a garrison on Epitaph, closed the dimensional gates, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I appointed Heinrix to her and ordered her to pick him up on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you—you ended up being the ace in Theodora's sleeve, her secret heir{mf||ess}."

But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you—you ended up being the ace in Theodora's sleeve, her secret heir{mf||ess}."

"I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to pick him up on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."

"I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to rendezvous with him on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."

languages.text: « J'ai alors lancé l'opération Précieuse Sentinelle : j'ai posté une garnison sur Épitaphe, fermé le portail dimensionnel après avoir pris la clé à Théodora et commencé la création du Joug, tout en gardant la libre-marchande et ses héritiers à l'œil par précaution. Peu avant sa mort, je lui ai adjoint Heinrix et lui ai donné l'ordre de le rejoindre sur Rykad Minoris, mais Votre Seigneurie a hérité de lui à la place. Je dois admettre que j'ignorais tout de vous ; Théodora avait réussi à me cacher cet atout secret. »
languages.original_text: "I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to rendezvous with him on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai alors lancé l'opération Précieuse Sentinelle, laissé une garnison sur Épitaphe, fermé le portail dimensionnel et commencé la création du Joug, tout en gardant Théodora et ses héritiers à l'œil par précaution. Peu avant sa mort, je lui ai adjoint Heinrix et lui ai donné l'ordre de le récupérer sur Rykad Minoris, mais Votre Seigneurie a hérité de lui à la place. Je dois admettre que j'ignorais tout de vous : vous étiez l'atout dans la manche de Théodora, son {mf|héritier secret|héritière secrète}. »

languages.text: «Di comienzo a la operación Centinela Preciado. Dejé una guarnición en Epitafio, me hice con la llave del portal dimensional de manos de Theodora, lo sellé y empecé a crear el Yugo. No dejé de vigilar a Theodora y a sus herederos, por si acaso. Poco antes de su muerte, le asigné a Heinrix y le ordené reunirse con él en Rykad Minoris, pero había un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a}: usted. Admito no haber estado al corriente de su existencia. Theodora consiguió mantener{mf|le|la} en secreto, como un as en la manga».
languages.original_text: "I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to rendezvous with him on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."

traits.locale_text: «Aprobé la operación Guardián Preciado en cuanto dejé una guarnición en Epitafio, cerré los portales dimensionales e inicié la creación del Yugo. Presté mucha atención a Theodora y sus herederos en potencia, por si acaso. No mucho antes de su muerte, le asigné a Heinrix y ordené que lo recogiera en Rykad Minoris, pero al final fue mi{mf|lord|lady} quien se quedó con él. Admito no haber estado al corriente de su existencia. Ha sido el as en la manga de Theodora; un{mf||a} hereder{mf|o|a} secret{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: “当我离开荒垄碑碣的时候，我在那里留下了驻军，开始执行神圣守护计划。我从西奥多拉那里拿走了次元门钥匙，关闭了次元门，开始制造‘圣枷’这件武器。我一直死死地盯着西奥多拉与她的继承人的动向，以防万一。她死前不久，我把海因里希调到了她那边，命令她去小莱卡德接海因里希上船。然而，大人，最终却是你成为了她的继承人。我得承认，我之前并没有留意过你。原来你才是她的王牌，她的秘密继承人。”
languages.original_text: "I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to rendezvous with him on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."

traits.locale_text: “当我离开荒垄碑碣的时候，我在那里留下了驻军，开始执行神圣守护计划。我关闭了次元门，开始制造‘圣枷’这件武器。我一直死死地盯着西奥多拉与她的继承人的动向，以防万一。她死前不久，我把海因里希调到了她那边，命令她去小莱卡德接海因里希上船。然而，大人，最终却是你成为了她的继承人。我得承认，我之前并没有留意过你。原来你才是她的王牌，她的秘密继承人。”

languages.text: "Ich habe mit Operation 'Wertvoller Wächter' begonnen. Ich habe eine Garnison auf Epitaph zurückgelassen, mir Theodoras Schlüssel für das Dimensionstor genommen, das Tor versiegelt und mit dem Bau des Jochs begonnen. Ich habe Theodora und ihre Erben sicherheitshalber beobachtet. Kurz vor ihrem Tod habe ich Heinrix ihr zugewiesen und ihr befohlen, sich auf Rykad Minoris mit ihm zu treffen. Stattdessen hat Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft ihn geerbt. Ich muss gestehen, ich wusste nichts von Eurer Existenz. Theodora hat {mf|ihren geheimen Erben|ihre geheime Erbin} als Ass im Ärmel behalten."
languages.original_text: "I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to rendezvous with him on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe grünes Licht für die Operation Wertvoller Wächter gegeben, als ich eine Garnison auf Epitaph verlassen, die Dimensionstore geschlossen und mit dem Bau des Jochs begonnen habe. Ich habe Theodora und ihre Erben sicherheitshalber beobachtet. Kurz vor ihrem Tod habe ich Heinrix zu ihr abgestellt und ihr befohlen, ihn auf Rykad Minoris abzuholen. Stattdessen hat Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft ihn geerbt. Ich muss gestehen, ich wusste nichts von Eurer Existenz. Ihr habt Euch als Ass in Theodoras Ärmel entpuppt, als {mf|ihr geheimer Erbe|ihre geheime Erbin}."

languages.text: 「私はプレシャス・センチネル作戦を開始した。エピタフに駐留軍を残し、超次元の門の鍵をシオドーラから奪い、門を閉じ、ヨークの創造を開始した。念のためにシオドーラとその後継者を監視していたのだよ。彼女が亡くなる少し前、ハインリックスを彼女の担当者に任命し、ライカド・ミノリスで落ち合うよう命じた。しかし、シオドーラではなく陛下がハインリックスを手にした。私はあなたのことを存じてはいなかったのだよ。どうやらシオドーラは秘密の後継者を巧妙に隠していたようだ」
languages.original_text: "I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to rendezvous with him on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."

traits.locale_text: 「私はプレシャス・センチネル作戦を開始した。エピタフに駐留軍を残し、超次元の門の鍵をシオドーラから奪い、門を閉じ、ヨークの創造を開始した。念のためにシオドーラとその後継者を監視していたのだよ。彼女が亡くなる少し前、ハインリックスを彼女の担当者に任命し、ライカド・ミノリスで落ち合うよう命じた。しかし、シオドーラではなく陛下がハインリックスを手にした。私はあなたのことを存じてはいなかったのだよ。どうやらシオドーラは秘密の後継者を巧妙に隠していたようだ」

languages.text: "Değerli Nöbetçi Operasyonu'nu başlattım. Sinyazıt'ta bir garnizon bıraktım, Theodora'dan boyutsal geçidin anahtarını aldım, geçidi kapattım ve Boyunduruk üzerinde çalışmaya başladım. Theodora ile vârislerini ne olur ne olmaz diye gözümün önünde tuttum. Ölümünden kısa süre önce Heinrix'i onun için çalışması amacıyla görevlendirdim ve Theodora'ya, Heinrix'le Rykad Minoris'te buluşmasını emrettim. Fakat {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Heinrix'i devraldı. Sizden haberim yoktu. Theodora, gizli vârisini korumayı başarmıştı."
languages.original_text: "I commenced Operation Precious Sentinel — I left a garrison on Epitaph, took the key to the dimensional gate from Theodora, sealed the gate, and started the creation of the Yoke. I kept Theodora and her heirs in my sights, just in case. Not long before her death, I assigned Heinrix to her and ordered her to rendezvous with him on Rykad Minoris. But Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} inherited him instead. I admit I wasn't aware of you — Theodora managed to keep her secret heir up her sleeve."
